Class SmartDatabase

  • java.lang.Object
    • SmartDatabase

  • public class SmartDatabase
extends java.lang.Object
    This class serves as the "SmartDatabase" it will store all of it's elements based on their total times.
    Author:
    Craig Lombardo

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SmartDatabase(FoodRules rules)
      This constructor creates a new SmartDatabase with a specified ruleset.

    • Method Summary

      void add(Recipe newR)
      This method adds a new Recipe to the database.

      This method finds and returns the information of the first recipe that matches the inclusions exclusions and time, or closest time with correct inclusions/exclusions if no exact time match.
      java.lang.String plan(int time, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> include, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> exclude, java.lang.String type)
      This method prints out the information of the dishes that best satisfy the passed conditions.

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public void add(Recipe newR)
        This method adds a new Recipe to the database.
        Parameters:
        newR - The new Recipe to add to the database.

      • find

        public Recipe find(int time,
                   java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> include,
                   java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> exclude,
                   java.lang.String type,
                   boolean plan,
                   java.lang.String course)
        This method finds and returns the information of the first recipe that matches the inclusions exclusions and time, or closest time with correct inclusions/exclusions if no exact time match.
        Parameters:
        time - The time of the recipe you would like it to be under.
        include - The list of things that must be included.
        exclude - The list of things that must be excluded.
        type - The cuisine type of the Recipe
        plan - A boolean corresponding to whether or not the search is for a meal plan.
        course - The course of the Recipe.
        Returns:
        The info of the Recipe with the best match.

      • plan

        public java.lang.String plan(int time,
                             java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> include,
                             java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> exclude,
                             java.lang.String type)
        This method prints out the information of the dishes that best satisfy the passed conditions.
        Parameters:
        time - The time of the recipe you would like it to be under.
        include - The list of things that must be included.
        exclude - The list of things that must be excluded.
        type - The cuisine type of the Recipe.
        Returns:
        The meal plan we have found that satisfies the conditions.
